name: NYDailyNews
text:
Mississippi politicians voted in favor of a state flag makeover that would cut the Confederate battle flag image.

“The flag is beloved by some, reviled by many,” State senator Briggs Hopson said. “I’m ready to rip the Band-Aid off.”
https://t.co/AQBfLjSAk2

name: NYDailyNews
text:
Rep. Carolyn Maloney and challenger Suraj Patel sparred over claims of "voter suppression" in a too-close-to-call primary.

So far about 31,000 absentee ballots have been received, and all of which were postmarked by election day will be counted.
https://t.co/PYbsO5B3BF

name: NYDailyNews
text:
RT @NYDailyNews: Florida reports a latest single-day high with nearly 9,000 new coronavirus cases, as the death toll rose to 3,366.

Gov. Ron DeSantis warned bars could lose their liquor license if they didn’t comply.

Florida was one of the first to reopen amid the virus.
https://t.co/0Auc6RZRGU

name: NYDailyNews
text:
"Master" will no longer be used to describe bathrooms and bedrooms by Texas real estate group the Houston Association of Realtors.

The group is instead opting for “primary” as a more inclusive descriptor.
https://t.co/ZkLrArnVl5

name: NYDailyNews
text: RT @TomBiersdorfer: Our @NYDNSports back page: Before pandemic, @Yankees and @Dodgers were World Series favorites. Now, with a 60-game sprint, a whole bunch of teams have a real shot. Column by @MikeLupica -- https://t.co/zo88pv830h https://t.co/74pYZF8Fum

name: NYDailyNews
text:
A noose in a black firefighter’s locker prompted a probe in the Minneapolis suburb of Bloomington.

Bloomington mayor Tim Busse expressed his disgust at the “cowardly act” while stating the serious matter is aggressively being dealt with.
https://t.co/yL5LkK76G0

name: NYDailyNews
text:
The Daily News is celebrating NYC’s high school seniors with a special edition featuring valedictorian speeches from across the five boroughs.

Plus speeches from de Blasio, Richard Carranza and late-night hosts Desus & Mero.

Check it out here: https://t.co/ppOvWYHuzL https://t.co/aAvyWQDzVm

name: NYDailyNews
text:
A coronavirus movie is in the works with "Bombshell" writer Charles Randolph set to write and direct it.

The untitled film will focus on the medical community in Wuhan, the city in Central China where the virus is believed to have originated.
https://t.co/0M9sUIKRLV

name: NYDailyNews
text:
SEE IT: A gunman fired off shots on a Bronx street in a caught-on-video attack.

The unknown man and the 25-year-old victim exchanged words before the man pulled out a gun and shot the victim one time in each leg.
https://t.co/5rLfqBMMEb

name: NYDailyNews
text:
The "Golden Girls" blackface episode was removed from Hulu.

While the show overwhelmingly portrayed characters of disparate races and backgrounds with respect during its seven-year run, several other episodes could also be viewed as cringeworthy.
https://t.co/KLuIg1FTSD

name: NYDailyNews
text: Costco has begun offering food samples again in as many as 30 locations, but the sampling stations look nothing like the gluttonous free-for-all tables of yore. https://t.co/p07ZsXeZVt
